# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this repository, please report it by emailing security@hummbl.dev or opening a confidential issue.

- Do **not** disclose security issues publicly until they have been reviewed and patched.
- See [docs/bugs/](../docs/bugs/) for known issues and mitigations.

## Supported Versions

Only the latest release of the main branch is actively supported with security updates.

## Responsible Disclosure

We appreciate responsible disclosure and will respond promptly to all reports.
